post.text: Beautiful evening in Wisconsin- THANK YOU for your incredible support tonight! Everyone get out on November 8th - and VOTE! LETS MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN! -DJT

comment.author: Arilyn
comment.text: Mr. Trump, your supporters are waiting eagerly to see your great debating skills again like last debate on Wednesday. You have to expose DNC unethical and illegal ways to rig this election and fool American people. You have to do job of media as many people don't even know how to access computers etc but they hear very well in debates. This time tell your opponent not to keep blocking your way and then claiming you were stalking her. You do what you have to do and defeat her in debate with more force than last time. Get under her skin and out of her memorized lines. Our prayers are with next USA POTUS Mr. Donald J Trump. ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸

replies.author: Richard
replies.text: She not only walked in front of him, but the media had a body language "expert" telling America that she was afraid for Mrs. Clinton, because Trump was "lurking and looming" behind her. WHAT?! What nonsense!!! Mostly, he was standing like a gentleman at HIS podium. Where else was he supposed to stand? Clinton is the one who moved. How many childish tricks do these manipulative liars have up their sleeves?! Do they REALLY think this kind of nonsense makes them fit to run a Country?!

replies.author: Katherine
replies.text: If you are waiting to see Trumps great debating skills you have a LONG, LONG wait because he has none! Hahahaha! Hilary all the way to the Whitehouse!!
